column1: Little Goat Diner////The goat chili came out first. The meat was tender and had a perfect balance of smokey
column4: and while it is not at all spicy
column6: I cannot say the same for "This Little Piggy Went to China
column7: Little's Goat's Asian fusion riff on the breakfast biscuit. The sausage was tasty, but the sauce was cloyingly sweet, which is not what we expected from the description, and overwhelmingly one note (sesame).
